name: Wooting 80HE
description: Revolutionary analog keyboard with adjustable actuation from 0.1mm to 4mm. Features Rapid Trigger for competitive gaming and Lekker hall-effect switches. The esports choice.

reviews.review_text: Rapid Trigger changed my game. Literally unfair advantage.
0.1mm actuation for gaming, 2mm for typing. Best of both.
Worth the wait. Nothing else comes close for gaming.
